# Mishwa Portfolio

Official portfolio website for Mishwa Zalavadiya, a Surat-based video editor and visual artist.

## Focus Areas
- High-retention Instagram Reels editing
- Cinematic storytelling
- Social-first video ads and brand edits

## Canonical Site
- https://mishwa.unitednodes.space

## Key Pages
- Home: https://mishwa.unitednodes.space/
- Reels Archive: https://mishwa.unitednodes.space/reels
- Portfolio Profile: https://mishwa.unitednodes.space/mishwa-zalavadiya-portfolio
- Video Editor Portfolio: https://mishwa.unitednodes.space/mishwa-zalavadiya-video-editor-portfolio
- Surat Portfolio: https://mishwa.unitednodes.space/surat-video-editor-portfolio

## Contact / Social
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_thecoco_club/
